channel.title: 2006Memorys source doesnt have a player folder
channel.description: i recently downloaded the 2006memories source and client and noticed it doesnt have a player folder so nothing is being saved can someone help me out. If you want to help me on skype or even help make the server with me add me on skype my skype is Levyys25 Or ofcourse leave a reply in the comments

item.title: 2006Memorys source doesnt have a player folder
item.dc:creator: @levyys levyys
item.description:
@levyys wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:547129”][quote author=levyys link=topic=666027.msg4452687#msg4452687 date=1412628183]

You’re kidding, right?

wait is the answer obvious or something, sorry im really new to private servers and not sure whats wrong
[/quote]
Right click > new > folder
…
name it characters[/quote]
Omg loool thanks man sorry im really dumb

Read full topic
